title: Linotype L100 avail in Melbourne, Aust. for Type/Prepress Historian/Collector
content:
Hi,

Some time around 1990 I purchased a Linotype L100 PostScript capstan imagesetter to typeset galleys for pasteup. As far as I know, this was the first high-resolution PostScript device (up to 1270dpi).

Unfortunately I don't have space for it, and it will be have to be scrapped if I cannot find a better home for it. It was working when decommissioned and is basically complete but has sustained some minor damage to main circuit board during transit.

Contact me here...

--Toby
author: qu1j0t3
